downloadDescription: The Visual Basic Language Specification provides a complete description of the Visual Basic language 9.0.
detailsSection: The Visual Basic Language Specification provides a complete description of the Visual Basic language 9.0.
systemRequirementsSection:
Requires 1.7 MB of disk space to download.
Requires Microsoft Word or Microsoft Word Viewer to view.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download link to start the download.
2. Do one of the following:
- To open the document immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.
- To copy the document to your computer for viewing at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
